masterGrammar.rule: rule {CP option conj - conjoined CPs} CP = (InitConj) CP_1 Conj CP_2 <CP head> = <CP_2 head> <Conj head type conjoins_IP> = + <CP conjoined> = + <CP_1 conjoined> = - |limit recursion <CP head type prefix> <= <CP_1 head type prefix> <CP option> = conj

rule {CP option conjPrefix - conjoined CPs} CP = CP_1 CP_2 <CP head> = <CP_2 head> <CP conjoined> = + <CP_1 conjoined> = - |limit recursion <CP_2 head type prefix conj> = + <CP head type prefix> <= <CP_1 head type prefix> <CP option> = conjPrefix

rule {CP option conjSuffix - conjoined CPs} CP = CP_1 CP_2 <CP head> = <CP_2 head> <CP conjoined> = + <CP_1 conjoined> = - |limit recursion <CP_1 head type suffix conj> = + <CP head type prefix> <= <CP_1 head type prefix> <CP option> = conjSuffix

rule {CP option conjNone - conjoined CPs} CP = CP_1 CP_2 <CP head> = <CP_2 head> <CP conjoined> = + <CP_1 conjoined> = - |limit recursion <CP_2 head type prefix conj> = - <CP_1 head type suffix conj> = - <CP_1 head type comma> = - <CP head type prefix> <= <CP_1 head type prefix> <CP option> = conjNone
rule {CP option 1 - no fronting, root} CP = C' <CP head> = <C' head> <C' head type root > = + <C' head type vacuous> = - <C' head type relative> = - <C' head fronted> = none <CP option> = 1

rule {CP option 2a - DP specifier initial, wh, root} CP = DP C' <CP head> = <C' head> <C' head type root> = + <C' head type question> = + <C' head type relative> = - <C' head fronted> = <DP> <DP head type wh> = + <DP head type suffix poss> = - | only in possessor position <DP head type prefix poss> = - <DP head type prefix copular> = - | only in no V/Aux copulars <DP head type suffix copular> = - <DP head type comma> = - <CP option> = 2a

rule {CP option 2b - PP specifier initial, wh, root} CP = PP C' <CP head> = <C' head> <C' head type root> = + <C' head type question> = + <C' head type relative> = - <C' head fronted> = <PP> <PP head type wh> = + <PP head type suffix poss> = - | only in possessor position <PP head type prefix poss> = - <PP head type comma> = - <CP option> = 2b

rule {CP option 2c - AdvP specifier initial, wh, root} CP = AdvP C' <CP head> = <C' head> <C' head type root> = + <C' head type question> = + <C' head type relative> = - <C' head fronted> = <AdvP> <AdvP head type wh> = + <AdvP head type comma> = - <CP option> = 2c

rule {CP option 2d - C, DP specifier initial, wh, root} CP = C DP IP <CP head> = <IP head> <IP head type root> = + <IP head type question> = + <C head type question> = + <C head type wh> = + <C head type CP-specifier-initial> = + <IP head type relative> = - <IP head fronted> = <DP> <DP head type wh> = + <DP head type suffix poss> = - | only in possessor position <DP head type prefix poss> = - <DP head type prefix copular> = - | only in no V/Aux copulars <DP head type suffix copular> = - <C head type comma> = - <DP head type comma> = - <CP option> = 2d

rule {CP option 2e - C, PP specifier initial, wh, root} CP = C PP IP <CP head> = <IP head> <IP head type root> = + <IP head type question> = + <C head type question> = + <C head type wh> = + <C head type CP-specifier-initial> = + <IP head type relative> = - <IP head fronted> = <PP> <PP head type wh> = + <PP head type suffix poss> = - | only in possessor position <PP head type prefix poss> = - <C head type comma> = - <PP head type comma> = - <CP option> = 2e

rule {CP option 2f - C, AdvP specifier initial, wh, root} CP = C AdvP IP <CP head> = <IP head> <IP head type root> = + <IP head type question> = + <C head type question> = + <C head type wh> = + <C head type CP-specifier-initial> = + <IP head type relative> = - <IP head fronted> = <AdvP> <AdvP head type wh> = + <C head type comma> = - <AdvP head type comma> = - <CP option> = 2f
rule {CP option 3 - no fronting, non-root} CP = C' <CP head> = <C' head> <C' head type root > = - <C' head type vacuous> = - | to avoid empty CP <C' head fronted cat> = none <CP option> = 3

rule {CP option 4a - DP specifier initial, wh, non-root} CP = DP C' <CP head> = <C' head> <C' head type root> = - <C' head type question> = + <C' head type wh> = + <C' head type relative> = - <C' head fronted> = <DP> <DP head type wh> = + <DP head type suffix poss> = - | only in possessor position <DP head type prefix poss> = - <DP head type prefix copular> = - | only in no V/Aux copulars <DP head type suffix copular> = - <DP head type comma> = - <CP option> = 4a

rule {CP option 4arel - DP specifier initial, wh, relative clause} CP = DP C' <CP head> = <C' head> <C' head type root> = - <C' head type relative> = + <C' head type wh> = + <C' head fronted> = <DP> <DP head type wh> = + <DP head type relative> = + <DP head type suffix poss> = - | only in possessor position <DP head type prefix poss> = - <DP head type prefix copular> = - | only in no V/Aux copulars <DP head type suffix copular> = - <DP head type comma> = - <CP option> = 4arel

rule {CP option 4b - PP specifier initial, wh, non-root} CP = PP C' <CP head> = <C' head> <C' head type root> = - <C' head type question> = + <C' head fronted> = <PP> <C' head type relative> = - <PP head type wh> = + <PP head type suffix poss> = - | only in possessor position <PP head type prefix poss> = - <PP head type comma> = - <CP option> = 4b

rule {CP option 4c - AdvP specifier initial, wh, non-root} CP = AdvP C' <CP head> = <C' head> <C' head type root> = - <C' head type question> = + <C' head type relative> = - <C' head fronted> = <AdvP> <AdvP head type wh> = + <AdvP head type comma> = - <CP option> = 4c

rule {CP option 4d - C, DP specifier initial, wh, non-root} CP = C DP IP <CP head> = <IP head> <IP head type root> = - <IP head type question> = + <C head type question> = + <C head type wh> = + <C head type CP-specifier-initial> = + <IP head type relative> = - <IP head fronted> = <DP> <DP head type wh> = + <DP head type suffix poss> = - | only in possessor position <DP head type prefix poss> = - <DP head type prefix copular> = - | only in no V/Aux copulars <DP head type suffix copular> = - <C head type comma> = - <DP head type comma> = - <CP option> = 4d

rule {CP option 4e - C, PP specifier initial, wh, non-root} CP = C PP IP <CP head> = <IP head> <IP head type root> = - <IP head type question> = + <C head type question> = + <C head type wh> = + <C head type CP-specifier-initial> = + <IP head type relative> = - <IP head fronted> = <PP> <PP head type wh> = + <PP head type suffix poss> = - | only in possessor position <PP head type prefix poss> = - <C head type comma> = - <PP head type comma> = - <CP option> = 4e

rule {CP option 4f - C, AdvP specifier initial, wh, non-root} CP = C AdvP IP <CP head> = <IP head> <IP head type root> = - <IP head type question> = + <C head type question> = + <C head type wh> = + <C head type CP-specifier-initial> = + <IP head type relative> = - <C' head fronted> = <AdvP> <AdvP head type wh> = + <C head type comma> = - <AdvP head type comma> = - <CP option> = 4f

rule {CP option Neg - DP or AdvP specifier initial, negative, fronted} CP = {DP / AdvP} IP <CP head> = <IP head> <IP head type question> = - <IP head type relative> = - <IP head fronted> = <DP> <IP head fronted> = <AdvP> <DP head infl polarity> = negative <AdvP head infl polarity> = negative <IP head infl polarity> <= <DP head infl polarity> <IP head infl polarity> <= <AdvP head infl polarity> <AdvP head type comma> = - <DP head type comma> = - <CP option> = Neg

rule {CP option FocusInit - FocusP initial} CP = FocusP IP <CP head> = <IP head> <IP head type question> = - <IP head type relative> = - <IP head fronted> = <FocusP> <IP head type pro-drop> = - <FocusP head type comma> = - <FocusP head> == [type:[focusmarked:-]] -> ~[case:nominative] | subject in place, not focused, unless focusmarked <CP option> = FocusInit

rule {CP option FocusInitPro - FocusP initial, with pro-drop} CP = FocusP IP <CP head> = <IP head> <IP head type question> = - <IP head type relative> = - <IP head fronted> = <FocusP> <IP head type pro-drop> = + <FocusP head type comma> = - <FocusP head> == ~[case:nominative] | subject pro-dropped, not focused <CP head> == [fronted:[head:[agr:[person:first]]]] -> ~[subject:[head:[agr:[person:first]]]] <CP head> == [fronted:[head:[agr:[person:second]]]] -> ~[subject:[head:[agr:[person:second]]]] <CP option> = FocusInitPro

rule {CP option FocusFin - FocusP final} CP = IP FocusP <CP head> = <IP head> <IP head type question> = - <IP head type relative> = - <IP head fronted> = <FocusP> <IP head type pro-drop> = - <IP head type comma> = - <CP head type comma> <= <FocusP head type comma> <FocusP head> == [type:[focusmarked:-]] -> ~[case:nominative] | subject in place, not focused, unless focusmarked <CP option> = FocusFin

rule {CP option FocusFinPro - FocusP final, with pro-drop} CP = IP FocusP <CP head> = <IP head> <IP head type question> = - <IP head type relative> = - <IP head fronted> = <FocusP> <IP head type pro-drop> = + <IP head type comma> = - <CP head type comma> <= <FocusP head type comma> <CP head> == [fronted:[head:[agr:[person:first]]]] -> ~[subject:[head:[agr:[person:first]]]] <CP head> == [fronted:[head:[agr:[person:second]]]] -> ~[subject:[head:[agr:[person:second]]]] <CP option> = FocusFinPro

rule {CBar option 1a - head vacuous, root, no aux fronting} C' = IP <C' head> = <IP head> <C' head type root> = + <C' head type relative> = - <C' head type vacuous> = + | to avoid empty CP <C' option> = 1a

rule {CBar option 1b - head vacuous, root, with possible aux fronting} C' = IP <C' head> = <IP head> <C' head type root> = + <C' head type relative> = - <C' head type vacuous> = + | to avoid empty CP <IP head type auxiliary> = - | if aux present, must front <C' option> = 1b

rule {CBar option 1c - head-initial, question, root} C' = C IP <C' head> = <IP head> <C head type root> = + <C head type relative> = - <C head type question> = + <C' head type root> = + <C' head type relative> = - <C' head type question> = + <C head type CP-initial> = + <C head type comma> = - <C' option> = 1c

rule {CBar option 1d - Aux initial, question, root} C' = Aux IP <C' head> = <IP head> <C' head type root> = + <C' head type question> = + <C' head type relative> = - <Aux head type comma> = - <C' option> = 1d

rule {CBar option 1e - head-final, question, root} C' = IP C <C' head> = <IP head> <C head type root> = + <C head type relative> = - <C head type question> = + <C' head type root> = + <C' head type question> = + <C' head type relative> = - <C head type CP-final> = + <IP head type comma> = - <C' head type comma> <= <C head type comma> <C' option> = 1e

rule {CBar option 1f - Aux final, question, root} C' = IP Aux <C' head> = <IP head> <C' head type root> = + <C' head type question> = + <C' head type relative> = - <IP head type comma> = - <C' head type comma> <= <Aux head type comma> <C' option> = 1f

rule {CBar option 1g - head both sides, question, root} C' = C IP C_1 <C' head> = <IP head> <C head type root> = + <C head type relative> = - <C head type question> = + <C_1 head type root> = + <C_1 head type relative> = - <C_1 head type question> = + <C' head type root> = + <C' head type question> = + <C' head type relative> = - <C head type CP-initial> = + <C_1 head type CP-final> = + <C head type comma> = - <IP head type comma> = - <C' head type comma> <= <C_1 head type comma> <C' option> = 1g
rule {CBar option 2a - head vacuous, non-root, no aux fronting} C' = IP <C' head> = <IP head> <C' head type root> = - <C' head type vacuous> = + | to avoid empty CP <C' option> = 2a

rule {CBar option 2b - head vacuous, non-root, with possible aux fronting} C' = IP <C' head> = <IP head> <C' head type root> = - <C' head type relative> = - <C' head type vacuous> = + | to avoid empty CP <IP head type auxiliary> = - | if aux present, must front <C' option> = 2b

rule {CBar option 2c - head-initial, question, non-root} C' = C IP <C' head> = <IP head> <C head type root> = - <C head type relative> = - <C head type question> = + <C' head type root> = - <C' head type question> = + <C' head type relative> = - <C head type CP-initial> = + <C head type comma> = - <C' option> = 2c

rule {CBar option 2d - Aux initial, question, non-root} C' = Aux IP <C' head> = <IP head> <C' head type root> = - <C' head type question> = + <C' head type relative> = - <Aux head type comma> = - <C' option> = 2d

rule {CBar option 2e - head-final, question, non-root} C' = IP C <C' head> = <IP head> <C head type root> = - <C head type relative> = - <C head type question> = + <C' head type root> = - <C' head type question> = + <C' head type relative> = - <C head type CP-final> = + <IP head type comma> = - <C' head type comma> <= <C head type comma> <C' option> = 2e

rule {CBar option 2f - Aux final, question, non-root} C' = IP Aux <C' head> = <IP head> <C' head type root> = - <C' head type question> = + <C' head type relative> = - <IP head type comma> = - <C' head type comma> <= <Aux head type comma> <C' option> = 2f

rule {CBar option 2g - head both sides, question, non-root} C' = C IP C_1 <C' head> = <IP head> <C head type root> = - <C head type relative> = - <C head type question> = + <C_1 head type root> = - <C_1 head type relative> = - <C_1 head type question> = + <C' head type root> = - <C' head type question> = + <C' head type relative> = - <C head type CP-initial> = + <C_1 head type CP-final> = + <C head type comma> = - <IP head type comma> = - <C' head type comma> <= <C_1 head type comma> <C' option> = 2g

rule {CBar option 2j - head-initial, non-question, non-root} C' = C IP <C' head> = <IP head> <C head type root> = - <C head type relative> = - <C head type question> = - <C' head type root> = - <C' head type question> = - <C' head type relative> = - <C head type CP-initial> = + <C head type comma> = - <C' option> = 2j

rule {CBar option 2k - head-final, non-question, non-root} C' = IP C <C' head> = <IP head> <C head type root> = - <C head type relative> = - <C head type question> = - <C' head type root> = - <C' head type question> = - <C' head type relative> = - <C head type CP-final> = + <IP head type comma> = - <C' head type comma> <= <C head type comma> <C' option> = 2k

rule {CBar option 2l - head both sides, non-question, non-root} C' = C IP C_1 <C' head> = <IP head> <C head type root> = - <C head type relative> = - <C head type question> = - <C_1 head type root> = - <C_1 head type relative> = - <C_1 head type question> = - <C' head type root> = - <C' head type question> = - <C' head type relative> = - <C head type CP-initial> = + <C_1 head type CP-final> = + <C head type comma> = - <IP head type comma> = - <C' head type comma> <= <C_1 head type comma> <C' option> = 2l

rule {C' option 3a - YNQ_prefix, IP complement, root} C' = IP <C' head> = <IP head> {<IP head type prefix YNQ> = + /<IP head type YNQ> = + } <C' head type question> = + <C' head type relative> = - <C' head type root> = + <C' option> = 3a

rule {CBar option 3b - YNQ_suffix, IP complement, root} C' = IP <C' head> = <IP head> {<IP head type suffix YNQ> = + /<IP head type YNQ> = + } <C' head type question> = + <C' head type relative> = - <C' head type root> = + <C' option> = 3b

rule {CBar option 3c - YNQ_prefix, IP complement, non-root} C' = IP <C' head> = <IP head> {<IP head type prefix YNQ> = + /<IP head type YNQ> = + } <C' head type question> = + <C' head type relative> = - <C' head type root> = - <C' option> = 3c

rule {CBar option 3d - YNQ_suffix, IP complement, non-root} C' = IP <C' head> = <IP head> {<IP head type suffix YNQ> = + /<IP head type YNQ> = + } <C' head type question> = + <C' head type relative> = - <C' head type root> = + <C' option> = 3d

rule {CBar option 4a - whQ_prefix, IP complement, root} C' = IP <C' head> = <IP head> {<IP head type prefix whQ> = + /<IP head type whQ> = + } <C' head type question> = + <C' head type relative> = - <C' head type root> = + <C' option> = 4a

rule {CBar option 4b - whQ_suffix, IP complement, root} C' = IP <C' head> = <IP head> {<IP head type suffix whQ> = + /<IP head type whQ> = + } <C' head type question> = + <C' head type relative> = - <C' head type root> = + <C' option> = 4b

rule {CBar option 4c - whQ_prefix, IP complement, non-root} C' = IP <C' head> = <IP head> {<IP head type prefix whQ> = + /<IP head type whQ> = + } <C' head type question> = + <C' head type relative> = - <C' head type root> = - <C' option> = 4c

rule {CBar option 4d - whQ_suffix, IP complement, non-root} C' = IP <C' head> = <IP head> {<IP head type suffix whQ> = + /<IP head type whQ> = + } <C' head type question> = + <C' head type relative> = - <C' head type root> = + <C' option> = 4d

rule {CBar option 4e - comp_prefix, IP complement, non-root} C' = IP <C' head> = <IP head> {<IP head type prefix comp> = + /<IP head type comp> = + } <C' head type question> = - <C' head type relative> = - <C' head type root> = - <C' option> = 4e

rule {CBar option 4f - comp_suffix, IP complement, non-root} C' = IP <C' head> = <IP head> {<IP head type suffix comp> = + /<IP head type comp> = + } <C' head type question> = - <C' head type relative> = - <C' head type root> = + <C' option> = 4f

rule {CBar option 5a - head-initial, relative clause} C' = C IP <C' head> = <IP head> <C' head type root> = - <C' head type question> = - <C' head type relative> = + <C head type root> = - <C head type question> = - <C head type relative> = + <C head type CP-initial> = + <C head type comma> = - <C' option> = 5a

rule {CBar option 5b - head-final, relative clause} C' = IP C <C' head> = <IP head> <C' head type root> = - <C' head type question> = - <C' head type relative> = + <C head type root> = - <C head type question> = - <C head type relative> = + <C head type CP-final> = + <IP head type comma> = - <C' head type comma> <= <C head type comma> <C' option> = 5b

rule {CBar option 5c - head both sides, relative clause} C' = C IP C_1 <C' head> = <IP head> <C' head type root> = - <C' head type question> = - <C' head type relative> = + <C head type root> = - <C head type question> = - <C head type relative> = + <C_1 head type root> = - <C_1 head type question> = - <C_1 head type relative> = + <C head type CP-initial> = + <C_1 head type CP-final> = + <C head type comma> = - <IP head type comma> = - <C' head type comma> <= <C_1 head type comma> <C' option> = 5c

rule {CBar option 5d - relative_prefix, IP complement} C' = IP <C' head> = <IP head> <IP head type prefix relative> = + <C' head type question> = - <C' head type relative> = + <C' head type root> = - <C' option> = 5d

rule {CBar option 5e - relative_suffix, IP complement} C' = IP <C' head> = <IP head> <IP head type suffix relative> = + <C' head type question> = - <C' head type relative> = + <C' head type root> = + <C' option> = 5e

rule {CBar option 5f - relative_prefix and relative_suffix, IP complement} C' = IP <C' head> = <IP head> <IP head type prefix relative> = + <IP head type suffix relative> = + <C' head type question> = - <C' head type relative> = + <C' head type root> = + <C' option> = 5f

rule {CP option 6a - Conditional word before, Conseq word before} CP = Cond IP_1 Conseq IP_2 <CP head> = <IP_1 head> <Cond head infl mood> = conditional <Cond head type comma> = - <Conseq head type comma> = - <IP_1 head type comma> = + <CP option> = 6a

rule {CP option 6aF - Conditional word before, Conseq word after} CP = Cond IP_1 IP_2 Conseq <CP head> = <IP_1 head> <Cond head infl mood> = conditional <Cond head type comma> = - <IP_2 head type comma> = - <IP_1 head type comma> = + <CP option> = 6aF

rule {CP option 6aNoConseq - Conditional word before, no Conseq word} CP = Cond IP_1 IP_2 <CP head> = <IP_1 head> <Cond head infl mood> = conditional <Cond head type comma> = - <IP_1 head type comma> = + <CP option> = 6aNoConseq

rule {CP option 6b - Conditional word after, Conseq word before} CP = IP_1 Cond Conseq IP_2 <CP head> = <IP_1 head> <Cond head infl mood> = conditional <Cond head type comma> = + <Conseq head type comma> = - <IP_1 head type comma> = - <CP option> = 6b

rule {CP option 6bF - Conditional word after, Conseq word after} CP = IP_1 Cond IP_2 Conseq <CP head> = <IP_1 head> <Cond head infl mood> = conditional <Cond head type comma> = + <IP_2 head type comma> = - <IP_1 head type comma> = - <CP option> = 6bF

rule {CP option 6bNoConseq - Conditional word after, no Conseq word} CP = IP_1 Cond IP_2 <CP head> = <IP_1 head> <Cond head infl mood> = conditional <Cond head type comma> = + <IP_1 head type comma> = - <CP option> = 6bNoConseq

rule {CP option 6c - Conditional word both sides, Conseq word before} CP = Cond_1 IP_1 Cond_2 Conseq IP_2 <CP head> = <IP_1 head> <Cond_1 head infl mood> = conditional <Cond_2 head infl mood> = conditional <Cond_1 head type comma> = - <Cond_2 head type comma> = + <Conseq head type comma> = - <IP_1 head type comma> = - <CP option> = 6c

rule {CP option 6cF - Conditional word both sides, Conseq word after} CP = Cond_1 IP_1 Cond_2 IP_2 Conseq <CP head> = <IP_1 head> <Cond_1 head infl mood> = conditional <Cond_2 head infl mood> = conditional <Cond_1 head type comma> = - <Cond_2 head type comma> = + <IP_2 head type comma> = - <IP_1 head type comma> = - <CP option> = 6cF

rule {CP option 6cNoConseq - Conditional word both sides, no Conseq word} CP = Cond_1 IP_1 Cond_2 IP_2 <CP head> = <IP_1 head> <Cond_1 head infl mood> = conditional <Cond_2 head infl mood> = conditional <Cond_1 head type comma> = - <Cond_2 head type comma> = + <IP_1 head type comma> = - <CP option> = 6cNoConseq

rule {CP option 6d - Conditional proclitic, Conseq word before} CP = IP_1 Conseq IP_2 <CP head> = <IP_1 head> <IP_1 head infl mood> = conditional <IP_1 head type prefix conditional> = + <Conseq head type comma> = - <IP_1 head type comma> = + <CP option> = 6d

rule {CP option 6dF - Conditional proclitic, Conseq word after} CP = IP_1 IP_2 Conseq <CP head> = <IP_1 head> <IP_1 head infl mood> = conditional <IP_1 head type prefix conditional> = + <IP_2 head type comma> = - <IP_1 head type comma> = + <CP option> = 6dF

rule {CP option 6dNoConseq - Conditional proclitic, no Conseq word} CP = IP_1 IP_2 <CP head> = <IP_1 head> <IP_1 head infl mood> = conditional <IP_1 head type prefix conditional> = + <IP_1 head type comma> = + <CP option> = 6dNoConseq

rule {CP option 6e - Conditional enclitic, Conseq word before} CP = IP_1 Conseq IP_2 <CP head> = <IP_1 head> <IP_1 head infl mood> = conditional <IP_1 head type suffix conditional> = + <Conseq head type comma> = - <IP_1 head type comma> = + <CP option> = 6e

rule {CP option 6eF - Conditional enclitic, Conseq word after} CP = IP_1 IP_2 Conseq <CP head> = <IP_1 head> <IP_1 head infl mood> = conditional <IP_1 head type suffix conditional> = + <IP_2 head type comma> = - <IP_1 head type comma> = + <CP option> = 6eF

rule {CP option 6eNoConseq - Conditional enclitic, no Conseq word} CP = IP_1 IP_2 <CP head> = <IP_1 head> <IP_1 head infl mood> = conditional <IP_1 head type suffix conditional> = + <IP_1 head type comma> = + <CP option> = 6eNoConseq
rule {CP option 6f - Consequnece first, Conditional word before} CP = IP_1 Cond IP_2 <CP head> = <IP_2 head> <Cond head infl mood> = conditional <Cond head type comma> = - <CP option> = 6f
rule {CP option 6g - Consequence first, Conditional word after} CP = IP_1 IP_2 Cond <CP head> = <IP_2 head> <Cond head infl mood> = conditional <IP_2 head type comma> = - <CP option> = 6g

rule {CP option 6h - Consequence first, Conditional word both sides} CP = IP_1 Cond_1 IP_2 Cond_2 <CP head> = <IP_2 head> <Cond_1 head infl mood> = conditional <Cond_2 head infl mood> = conditional <Cond_1 head type comma> = - <IP_2 head type comma> = 1 <CP option> = 6h
rule {CP option 6i - Consequence first, Conditional proclitic} CP = IP_1 IP_2 <CP head> = <IP_2 head> <IP_2 head infl mood> = conditional <IP_2 head type prefix conditional> = + <CP option> = 6i
rule {CP option 6j - Consequence first, Conditional enclitic} CP = IP_1 IP_2 <CP head> = <IP_2 head> <IP_2 head infl mood> = conditional <IP_2 head type suffix conditional> = + <CP option> = 6j

rule {CP option 7a - subjunctive conditional word before} CP = Cond IP_1 IP_2 <CP head> = <IP_1 head> <Cond head type subjunctive_conditional> = + <Cond head type comma> = - <IP_1 head type comma> = + <CP option> = 7a

rule {CP option 7b - Subjunctive conditional word after} CP = IP_1 Cond IP_2 <CP head> = <IP_1 head> <Cond head type subjunctive_conditional> = + <Cond head type comma> = + <IP_1 head type comma> = - <CP option> = 7b

rule {CP option 7c - subjunctive conditional word both sides} CP = Cond_1 IP_1 Cond_2 IP_2 <CP head> = <IP_1 head> <Cond_1 head type subjunctive_conditional> = + <Cond_2 head type subjunctive_conditional> = + <Cond_1 head type comma> = - <Cond_2 head type comma> = + <IP_1 head type comma> = - <CP option> = 7c

rule {CP option 7d - subjunctive conditional proclitic} CP = IP_1 IP_2 <CP head> = <IP_1 head> <IP_1 head infl mood> = subjunctive <IP_1 head type prefix subjunctive_conditional> = + <IP_1 head type comma> = + <CP option> = 7d

rule {CP option 7e - subjunctive conditional enclitic} CP = IP_1 IP_2 <CP head> = <IP_1 head> <IP_1 head infl mood> = subjunctive <IP_1 head type suffix subjunctive_conditional> = + <IP_1 head type comma> = + <CP option> = 7e

rule {CP option 7f - Consequnece first, subjunctive conditional word before} CP = IP_1 Cond IP_2 <CP head> = <IP_2 head> <Cond head type subjunctive_conditional> = + <Cond head type comma> = - <CP option> = 7f

rule {CP option 7g - Consequence first, subjunctive conditional word after} CP = IP_1 IP_2 Cond <CP head> = <IP_2 head> <Cond head type subjunctive_conditional> = + <IP_2 head type comma> = - <CP option> = 7g

rule {CP option 7h - Consequence first, subjunctive conditional word both sides} CP = IP_1 Cond_1 IP_2 Cond_2 <CP head> = <IP_2 head> <Cond_1 head type subjunctive_conditional> = + <Cond_2 head type subjunctive_conditional> = + <Cond_1 head type comma> = - <IP_2 head type comma> = 1 <CP option> = 7h

rule {CP option 7i - Consequence first, subjunctive conditional proclitic} CP = IP_1 IP_2 <CP head> = <IP_2 head> <IP_2 head infl mood> = subjunctive <IP_2 head type prefix subjunctive_conditional> = + <CP option> = 7i

rule {CP option 7j - Consequence first, subjunctive conditional enclitic} CP = IP_1 IP_2 <CP head> = <IP_2 head> <IP_2 head infl mood> = subjunctive <IP_2 head type suffix subjunctive_conditional> = + <CP option> = 7j

rule {TopicP option nomarker} TopicP = DP <TopicP head> = <DP head> <DP head type topic> = + <DP head type focus> = - <DP head type wh> = - <DP head type temporal> = - <TopicP head type topic-marked> = - <TopicP option> = nomarker

rule {TopicP option markerinit} TopicP = TopicM DP <TopicP head> = <DP head> <TopicM head type topic-initial> = + <DP head type focus> = - <DP head type wh> = - <DP head type temporal> = - <TopicP head type topic-marked> = + <TopicM head type comma> = - <TopicP option> = markerinit

rule {TopicP option markerfin} TopicP = DP TopicM <TopicP head> = <DP head> <TopicM head type topic-final> = + <DP head type focus> = - <DP head type wh> = - <DP head type temporal> = - <TopicP head type topic-marked> = + <DP head type comma> = - <TopicP head type comma> <= <TopicM head type comma> <TopicP option> = markerfin

rule {TopicP option markerboth} TopicP = TopicM_1 DP TopicM_2 <TopicP head> = <DP head> <TopicM_1 head type topic-initial> = + <TopicM_2 head type topic-final> = + <DP head type focus> = - <DP head type wh> = - <DP head type temporal> = - <TopicP head type topic-marked> = + <TopicM_1 head type comma> = - <DP head type comma> = - <TopicP head type comma> <= <TopicM_2 head type comma> <TopicP option> = markerboth

rule {FocusP option nomarker} FocusP = DP <FocusP head> = <DP head> <DP head type focus> = + <DP head type topic> = - <DP head type wh> = - <DP head type temporal> = - <FocusP head type focusmarked> <= - <FocusP option> = nomarker

rule {FocusP option markerinit} FocusP = FocusM DP <FocusP head> = <DP head> <FocusM head type focus-initial> = + <DP head type focus> = + <DP head type topic> = - <DP head type wh> = - <DP head type temporal> = - <FocusP head type focusmarked> <= + <FocusM head type comma> = - <FocusP head case> <= <FocusM head case> <FocusP option> = markerinit

rule {FocusP option markerfin} FocusP = DP FocusM <FocusP head> = <DP head> <FocusM head type focus-final> = + <DP head type focus> = + <DP head type topic> = - <DP head type wh> = - <DP head type temporal> = - <DP head type comma> = - <FocusP head type comma> <= <FocusM head type comma> <FocusP head type focusmarked> <= + <FocusP option> = markerfin

rule {FocusP option markerboth} FocusP = FocusM_1 DP FocusM_2 <FocusP head> = <DP head> <FocusM_1 head type focus-initial> = + <FocusM_2 head type focus-final> = + <DP head type focus> = + <DP head type topic> = - <DP head type wh> = - <DP head type temporal> = - <FocusM_1 head type comma> = - <DP head type comma> = - <FocusP head type comma> <= <FocusM_2 head type comma> <FocusP head type focusmarked> <= + <FocusP option> = markerboth
